headline: General Mills (GIS): Assessing Valuation After a Prolonged Share Price Slide
summary: General Mills (GIS) has been grinding lower this year, and that steady slide is starting to catch income-focused investors’ attention. With the share price down sharply, the question now is whether the underlying business justifies the discount. See our latest analysis for General Mills. The latest leg down has left General Mills changing hands around $47.40, with a weak 90 day share price return of minus 6.25 percent and a three year total shareholder return of minus 38.04 percent,...
